description.description: Start career as programmer using Delphi and SQL Server some time later get project for build a Web Application using PHP.
Act as Head of Web Development for organized team workload, evaluate the work done by the team and coordinate with the other team as well.

Placed at DBS Bank Singapore for develop web application. Doing daily to project manager about development progress. Develop Web Application using React JS with typescript and using Jest as Automated Testing.
Placed at PT Adis Dimension Footwear as Web Developer. Collaborate with the team for created web apps for their internal use. Using Laravel PHP and Next JS.

- Maintained Trima+ Desktop, a Desktop Remote Trading application. 
- Collaborated with team to enhance application features and performance. 
- Conducted system analysis to optimize business flows related to finance and accounting. 
- Developed efficient, reusable code to improve application performance. 
- Participated in cross-functional meetings to align development with business needs.
